column6:
Another epic in the annals of the strongest super-team of all! Witness the mighty Thor, Iron Man, Captain America, Giant-Man and the wonderful Wasp defend against the incredible Hulk and "The Invasion of the Lava Men!"...a tale only Stan and Jack could tell! Plus: An all-new story written by Dwayne McDuffie (FANTASTIC FOUR) spotlighting Cap and Thor's earliest partnership!,2007,10
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Art Adams | writer:Stan Lee | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | inker:Mike Avon Oeming | letterer:Rus Wooton | colorist:Tom Ziuko
